1.12.1.0.1:
-Set modEnabled config property with default value.
-Removed latestVersion property from AbstractMod forcing concrete classes to implement.
1.12.1.1.0:
-Added new builder classes that build wrapper classes for common Minecraft classes (ex. Block, Item, ItemSword, etc).
Bug fixes.
1.12.1.1.1:
-Added additional util methods.
-Fixed Cube and Coords classes and WorldInfo methods.
1.12.1.2.0:
-Added AbstractModContainerBlock, AbstractModTileEntity.
Added getUpateURL() to IMod.
-Renamed getVerisionURL to getVersionURL in IMod.
-Added readFromNBT() and writeToNBT() methods to ICoords/Coords class.
-VersionChecker now first attempts to use the Forge update.json to track versions.
